front.title: Quarterly report for June 1, 1962 to September 1, 1962 on elastomeric seals and materials at cryogenic temperatures

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Additional data from the experiments on force decay, sealability, thermal expansion, and T are presented, together with brief discussions of the new results. Trie high speed rotating seal effort has been reactivated (with partial funding from another source) and machining of parts for the tester has begun. A simple method for automatic recording of rebound resilience has been developed. Two papers presented at the 1962 Cryogenic Engineering Conference are included.
